message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.RO. 

This paper deals with computer vision tasks such as human keypoints detection and instance segmentation, which are typically covered under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper also proposes a deep learning framework to learn a person instance segmentation model conditioned on human pose, which falls under the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The use of deep neural networks for learning and improving the segmentation model also aligns with the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of the COCO dataset, which is a popular benchmark for object detection and segmentation tasks, falling under the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a method to improve the segmentation accuracy in a constrained environment, which could be relevant to the robotics (cs.RO) sub-category.
